an2.265-269:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two qualities that result in happiness. What two? (265) Non-anger and non-hostility … (266) Non-denigration and non-insolence … (267) Non-envy and non-miserliness … (268) Non-deceitfulness and non-craftiness … (269) Moral shame and moral dread. These are the two qualities that result in happiness."
